thread.title: NBA: Dwight Howard shouldn't have been given technical and ejected
thread.title_full: NBA: Dwight Howard shouldn't have been given technical and ejected

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: NBA: Dwight Howard shouldn't have been given technical and ejected
text:
NBA: Dwight Howard shouldn't have been given technical and ejected NBA says Dwight Howard's second technical, for hanging on the rim, should not have been assessed. Post to Facebook NBA: Dwight Howard shouldn't have been given technical and ejected NBA says Dwight Howard's second technical, for hanging on the rim, should not have been assessed.  //usat.ly/2myZIAR   Join the Nation's Conversation   NBA: Dwight Howard shouldn't have been given technical and ejected USA TODAY Sports 2:22 a.m. ET Feb. 28, 2017 Dwight Howard will likely get his second technical foul rescinded. (Photo: Bob DeChiara, USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The NBA said in a statement late Monday night that Atlanta Hawks forward Dwight Howard should not have been assessed a technical foul for hanging on the rim and subsequently ejected. 
In a chippy contest against the Celtics in Boston, Howard was whistled for his second technical foul with about four minutes left in the third quarter after hanging on the rim on a dunk. Howard's first technical came shortly before after a scuffle with Celtics center Al Horford. 
The league said in its statement that Howard's second technical "should have been deemed non-unsportsmanlike and should not have resulted in his ejection." The following is being released by the NBA: pic.twitter.com/O0biF3XBF2 â€” NBA Official (@NBAOfficial) February 28, 2017 
Earlier in the third quarter, Howard went up for a shot and Horford grabbed his arm for a hard foul. As Howard got to his feet, he shoved Horford in the chest. Some more pushing and shouting ensued, and Howard was hit with his first technical. 
Howard had 17 points and 12 rebounds before the ejection, and the Hawks went on to win 114-98. 
"It was a good team win," Howard said. "I apologized to the guys and told them I need to do a better job of keeping my composure and some other things and they understood." 1st: Dwight vs. Al ðŸ‘€ pic.twitter.com/udpkmtaIhd â€” Bleacher Report (@BleacherReport) February 28, 2017 Dwight Howard got ejected for this. #NBA pic.twitter.com/Ev2NXN9hZI â€” FOX Sports: Hawks (@HawksOnFSSE) February 28, 2017

We're sorry.
